summary: The class orchestrates an AI-driven workflow that fills missing or unwanted regions in an image and simultaneously enhances its resolution. It manages input validation, text prompt handling, image and mask preprocessing, diffusion step scheduling, intermediate result handling, and safety checking to produce high‑quality, upscaled inpainted images.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to automatically repair and upscale visual assets, supporting applications such as photo restoration, marketing material preparation, and creative media generation with minimal manual effort.
